author: Special Correspondent
text:
Director General of Indian Coast Guard Rajendra Singh will pay a two-day visit to the State from Tuesday.

The Flag Officer, who will be given a traditional welcome with full military honours at Coast Guard Air Station in Chennai on Tuesday, also plans to call on Governor K. Rosaiah during his visit. The DG will leave for Kolkata on March 16, an official release stated.
title: CG chief to pay two-day visit to State
